price: Katika miaka michache. Amri ni ya Mwenyezi Mungu kabla yake na baada yake. Na siku hiyo Waumini watafurahi.
arabic: فِي بِضۡعِ سِنِينَۗ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ مِن قَبۡلُ وَمِنۢ بَعۡدُۚ وَيَوۡمَئِذٖ يَفۡرَحُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fī biḍ'ʿi sinīna lillahi al-amru min qablu wamin baʿdu wayawma-idhin yafraḥu al-mu'minūna
